pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Make contact with the right people.
  • Gather the information needed for Planning.
  • Understand your Customer’s needs.

• Meet with your manager to discuss the plan / approach for this opportunity.
  • Create an outline of a quote to be proposed to the Customer.
  • Add Products to your opportunity.
  • Prepare collateral material.
  • Start preparing the proposal for the Customer.
  • Cede / Notification process must be completed prior to sending out the proposal for National Accounts.
  • Capture Employer Contributions.
  • Capture Competitor Offerings.

• If your Proposal has been accepted, continue to the next stage. 
  • If your Proposal was rejected, fill out a Lost Reason in the Detail section below and move to the Closed Stage and indicate "Closed Lost".
  • Log a Group Request in CRM Pega and be sure to attach supporting documents.
  • Verify ALL Contact & Broker information for the Customer.
  • Verify Customer Total Eligible Employee Count.

• Send request to Underwriting if needed.
  • Send Quote / Proposal to Customer.
  • Negotiate as needed.
  • Attach confirmation/acceptance document(s).
